@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2009 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Fabian Jakobs (fjakobs) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Abstract base class for layers of a virtual pane. This class queues calls to {@link #fullUpdate}, {@link #updateLayerWindow} and {@link #updateLayerData} and only performs the absolute necessary actions. Concrete implementation of this class must at least implement the {@link #fullUpdate} method. Additionally the two methods {@link #updateLayerWindow} and {@link #_updateLayerData} may be implemented to increase the performance.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the first rendered row

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the first rendered column

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the sizes of the rendered rows

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the sizes of the rendered column

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Update the layer to reflect changes in the data the layer displays. Note: It is guaranteed that this method is only called after the layer has been rendered.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Do a complete update of the layer. All cached data should be discarded. This method is called e.g. after changes to the grid geometry (row/column sizes, row/column count, â€¦). Note: It is guaranteed that this method is only called after the layer has been rendered.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: firstRow {Integer} Index of the first row to display
@param.description: Index of the first row to display

@param.name: @param
@param.body: firstColumn {Integer} Index of the first column to display
@param.description: Index of the first column to display

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowSizes {Integer[]} Array of heights for each row to display
@param.description: Array of heights for each row to display

@param.name: @param
@param.body: columnSizes {Integer[]} Array of widths for each column to display
@param.description: Array of widths for each column to display

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Update the layer to display a different window of the virtual grid. This method is called if the pane is scrolled, resized or cells are prefetched. The implementation can assume that no other grid data has been changed since the last "fullUpdate" of "updateLayerWindow" call. Note: It is guaranteed that this method is only called after the layer has been rendered.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: firstRow {Integer} Index of the first row to display
@param.description: Index of the first row to display

@param.name: @param
@param.body: firstColumn {Integer} Index of the first column to display
@param.description: Index of the first column to display

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowSizes {Integer[]} Array of heights for each row to display
@param.description: Array of heights for each row to display

@param.name: @param
@param.body: columnSizes {Integer[]} Array of widths for each column to display
@param.description: Array of widths for each column to display

@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
